messages.messageBody:
I really need to stay away from eBay......

But I don't so I came across what will soon be the latest edition to
the slowly growing Koichi Sato collection -- a tale about the 47
Ronin----[b]CHUSHINGURA 1/47[/b]

The item number is 6300686038

Barb Sheridan
(who really needs to develop an original Shinsengumi/samurai board
game to fund this Japanese movie/drama addiction that _you people_ got
me started on LOL)
